Package com.epam.esm.service

Interface GiftCertificateService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GiftCertificateServiceImpl
    public interface GiftCertificateService
    The interface for operations with gift certificates.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      GiftCertificateDto createGiftCertificate​(GiftCertificateDto giftCertificateDto)
      Creates new gift certificate in database, if gift certificate has new tags they will be created
      void deleteGiftCertificate​(long id)
      Deletes gift certificate by id
      GiftCertificateDto findGiftCertificateById​(long id)
      Finds gift certificate by id
      PageDto<GiftCertificateDto> findGiftCertificates​(PaginationDto paginationDto, GiftCertificateSearchParamsDto searchParamsDto)
      Finds gift certificates by search params
      GiftCertificateDto updateAllGiftCertificate​(GiftCertificateDto giftCertificateDto)
      Updates gift certificate, all fields must be filled, if gift certificate has new tags they will be added
      GiftCertificateDto updateGiftCertificate​(GiftCertificateDto giftCertificateDto)
      Updates part of gift certificate data, if field value is null it will be not updated, if gift certificate has new tags they will be added

    • Method Detail

      • createGiftCertificate

        GiftCertificateDto createGiftCertificate​(GiftCertificateDto giftCertificateDto)
        Creates new gift certificate in database, if gift certificate has new tags they will be created
        Parameters:
        giftCertificateDto - the data for creating new gift certificate
        Returns:
        the created gift certificate dto

      • findGiftCertificateById

        GiftCertificateDto findGiftCertificateById​(long id)
        Finds gift certificate by id
        Parameters:
        id - the gift certificate id which needs to find
        Returns:
        the found gift certificate dto

      • findGiftCertificates

        PageDto<GiftCertificateDto> findGiftCertificates​(PaginationDto paginationDto,
                                                 GiftCertificateSearchParamsDto searchParamsDto)
        Finds gift certificates by search params
        Parameters:
        paginationDto - the data for pagination
        searchParamsDto - data for searching gift certificates
        Returns:
        the page with found gift certificates and total number of positions

      • updateGiftCertificate

        GiftCertificateDto updateGiftCertificate​(GiftCertificateDto giftCertificateDto)
        Updates part of gift certificate data, if field value is null it will be not updated, if gift certificate has new tags they will be added
        Parameters:
        giftCertificateDto - the data for updating gift certificate
        Returns:
        the updated gift certificate dto

      • updateAllGiftCertificate

        GiftCertificateDto updateAllGiftCertificate​(GiftCertificateDto giftCertificateDto)
        Updates gift certificate, all fields must be filled, if gift certificate has new tags they will be added
        Parameters:
        giftCertificateDto - the data for updating gift certificate
        Returns:
        the updated gift certificate dto

      • deleteGiftCertificate

        void deleteGiftCertificate​(long id)
        Deletes gift certificate by id
        Parameters:
        id - the gift certificate id which needs to delete
